Marufatu Abiola Bawuah (amụrụ 25 Septemba 1968) bụ nwanyị na-ahụ maka ego na onye azụmaahịa Naịjirịa
N'afọ 2014, ọ ghọrọ onye isi nchịkwa nakwa onye isi oche nke United Bank for Africa, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ ụmụ nwanyị mbụ nwere ọnọdụ ahụ

Ọ nwetala ọtụtụ ihe nrite maka ọrụ ya nke gụnyere 2016 Chartered Institute of Marketing Ghana (CIMG) Marketing Woman of the Year nakwa ihe nrite Fimace Personality of the Year Award na Ghana Accountancy and Finance
Bawuah tolitere na Aflao wee gụọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Achimota
Ọ gara n'ihu na agụm akwụkwọ ya na mahadum lagos dị na Naijiria, ebe ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ nke sayensị na Actuarial Science
O mechara nweta nzere bachelọ nke iwu (LLB) na Mahadum London
O nwetara diplọma n'ịre ahịa site na Ghana Institute of Management and Public Administration (GIMPA) na Executive of Master of Business Administration (EMBA) na ego sitere na Mahadum Ghana
N'ihe gbasara ịbụ onye isi, o nwere ọtụtụ iru eru na Harvard Business School, Columbia, University of New York, INSEAD na Institut Villa Pierrefeu na Switzerland
Ugbu a ọ bụ onye isi oche mpaghara (CEO) nke United Bank for Africa, na-ahụ maka mba isii gụnyere Ghana, Benin, Burkina Faso, Côte d'Ivoire, Liberia na Sierra Leone

Tupu nke ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Standard Chartered Bank dị ka onye na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta azụmahịa, nakwa na CAL Bank dị ka onye njikwa mmekọrịta, Strategic African Securities dị ka onye na-ere ahịa ikike, yana ya na Bentsi-Enchi na Letsa (ugbu a Bentsi-Enchil, Letsa na Ankomah) ụlọ ọrụ iwu dị ka onye ọrụ itinye ego
Na Jenụwarị 2023, Abiola Bawuah ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ onye isi oche nke UBA Africa..
Ọ lụọla dị ma nwee ụmụ atọ
